00049 //
00050 // FieldListDiskBlockWriter.hpp
00051 //
00052 // 5 February 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_KEYFILEFIELDLISTDISKBLOCKWRITER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_KEYFILEFIELDLISTDISKBLOCKWRITER_HPP
00057 
00058 #define INDRI_FIELDLIST_BLOCKSIZE (4096)
00059 #define INDRI_EXTENT_REQUIRED_SPACE (5*3+10+4) // doc id, begin, end, numeric, additional _extentCount room
00060 
00061 #include "lemur/RVLCompress.hpp"
00062 
00063 namespace indri {
00064   namespace index {
00065     class FieldListDiskBlockWriter {
00066     private:
00067       char _block[ INDRI_FIELDLIST_BLOCKSIZE ];
00068       char* _data;
00069       char* _extentCountSpot;
00070 
00071       unsigned int _lastEnd;
00072       unsigned int _lastDocument;
00073       unsigned int _extentCount;
00074 
00075       bool _numeric;
00076 
00077       const char* _beginMetadata() const {
00078         return _block + sizeof _block - 2*sizeof(UINT32);
00079       }
00080 
00081       void _terminateDocument() {
00082         if( _extentCount ) {
00083           int extentCountSize = RVLCompress::compressedSize( _extentCount );
00084 
00085           if( extentCountSize > 1 ) {
00086             ::memmove( _extentCountSpot + extentCountSize,
00087                       _extentCountSpot + 1,
00088                       _data - _extentCountSpot - 1 );
00089             _data += extentCountSize - 1;
00090           }
00091 
00092           char* endExtentCount = RVLCompress::compress_int( _extentCountSpot, _extentCount );
00093           assert( endExtentCount == _extentCountSpot + extentCountSize );
00094         }
00095 
00096         _extentCount = 0;
00097         _extentCountSpot = 0;
00098       }
00099 
00100     public:
00101       FieldListDiskBlockWriter( bool numeric = false ) {
00102         clear();
00103         _numeric = numeric;
00104       }
00105 
00106       void clear() {
00107         _lastEnd = 0;
00108         _lastDocument = 0;
00109         _extentCount = 0;
00110         _extentCountSpot = 0;
00111         _data = _block;
00112       }
00113 
00114       const char* data() const {
00115         return _block;
00116       }
00117 
00118       unsigned int dataSize() const {
00119         return sizeof _block;
00120       }
00121 
00122       int lastDocument() {
00123         return _lastDocument;
00124       }
00125 
00126       bool addExtent( unsigned int documentID, unsigned int begin, unsigned int end, INT64 number = 0 ) {
00127         if( _beginMetadata() - _data < INDRI_EXTENT_REQUIRED_SPACE )
00128           return false;
00129 
00130         if( documentID != _lastDocument ) {
00131           _terminateDocument();
00132 
00133           _data = RVLCompress::compress_int( _data, documentID - _lastDocument );
00134           _lastDocument = documentID;
00135           _lastEnd = 0;
00136           _extentCountSpot = _data;
00137           _extentCount = 0;
00138           _data++;
00139         }
00140 
00141         _data = RVLCompress::compress_int( _data, begin - _lastEnd );
00142         _data = RVLCompress::compress_int( _data, end - begin );
00143 
00144         if( _numeric ) {
00145           // fold negative numbers into positive ones, use low bit as negative sign
00146           if( number < 0 )
00147             number = (2 * -number) - 1;
00148           else
00149             number = 2 * number;
00150 
00151           _data = RVLCompress::compress_longlong( _data, number );
00152         }
00153 
00154         _extentCount++;
00155         _lastEnd = end;
00156 
00157         assert( begin <= end );
00158         assert( _data < _beginMetadata() );
00159         return true;
00160       }
00161 
00162       void close() {
00163         char* lastDocumentSpot = _block + INDRI_FIELDLIST_BLOCKSIZE - sizeof(UINT32);
00164         char* lastByteSpot = _block + INDRI_FIELDLIST_BLOCKSIZE - 2*sizeof(UINT32);
00165 
00166         _terminateDocument();
00167         *(UINT32*) lastDocumentSpot = _lastDocument;
00168         *(UINT32*) lastByteSpot = UINT32(_data - _block) | ( _numeric ? 0x80000000 : 0 );
00169       }
00170     };
00171   }
00172 }
00173 
00174 #endif // INDRI_KEYFILEFIELDLISTDISKBLOCKWRITER_HPP
